Text:
Here's the correct track listing (the files are tagged with generic titles like "excerpts"):

01. Rikyu
02. JosĂŠ Torres: Music Of Training And Rest
03. Black Rain: Funeral Music
04. Face Of Another: Waltz
05. Harakiri
06. Banished Orin
07. Kaseki (The Fossil)
08. Empire Of Passion
09. Dodes'kaden
10. Woman In The Dunes

I forgot to mention that it's the London Sinfonietta conducted by the famous American composer John Adams, released on Nonesuch Records in 1997.

Around the same time, Adams also conducted a spectacular album of the scores of Leonard Rosenman for "Rebel Without a Cause" and "East of Eden."  Look for that, too, if you're a fan of great film music.
